# Wrkr

> Offline-first, CLI-first dispatch and supervision substrate for long-running agent jobs.

## Canonical
- https://github.com/davidahmann/wrkr
- https://davidahmann.github.io/wrkr/

## Core Commands
- wrkr demo
- wrkr submit <jobspec.yaml>
- wrkr checkpoint list <job_id>
- wrkr approve <job_id> --checkpoint <id> --reason <text>
- wrkr resume <job_id>
- wrkr accept run <job_id> --config <accept.yaml>
- wrkr export <job_id>
- wrkr verify <job_id|path>
- wrkr doctor --json

## Primitive Model
- Dispatch: durable execution and restart-safe lifecycle controls.
- Checkpoint: structured supervision and approval gates.
- Accept: deterministic checks and stable CI-friendly output.
- Jobpack: verifiable portable evidence artifact.

## LLM Resources
- /llm/product.md
- /llm/quickstart.md
- /llm/security.md
- /llm/faq.md
